price: 12. Qolodii Nuux baa beeniyey hortood3, iyo qoladii ceelka (ee Azerbaijan)  iyo Thamuud.
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
footnotes: 3. Waa ka hor gaalada reer Makkah.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa-aṣḥābu al-rasi wathamūdu
